attributes.action: regularise the status of all illegal immigrants (failed asylum seekers, overstayers and others) and grant them ILR
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: illegals immigrants have suffered a lot already and the govt is now making them live like animals. they should be given the right to live freely and this applies to people who have been in the country for two years or more their status should be regularised and they should be granted ILR. we all have a right to family life and in no circumstances the british govt is right into making these people live in inhumane conditions. therefore we are petitioning for the govt to grant ILR to all illegal immigrants who have been here for two years or more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
